g.text: Shows to the Administrator a list of pharmacies and asks him to choose the one he wants update a drone.
Selects the Pharmacy he wants update a drone.
Shows to the Administrator a list of drones and asks him to choose the one he wants update.
Selects the drone he wants update.
Asks for the necessary drone's data (i.e. capacity (KG), power (W), max battery (W/H)).
Displays the data, requesting confirmation to update the drone.
Informs about the success of the operation
